abstract: Nick Confessore, who covers campaign finance for The Times, tells of his experience covering the Bush donor retreat in Kennebunkport, Me., and mixing crab cakes with lots of texting.

headline.main: A Reporter’s View: Covering the Bush Donor Retreat

snippet: Nick Confessore, who covers campaign finance for The Times, tells of his experience covering the Bush donor retreat in Kennebunkport, Me., and mixing crab cakes with lots of texting.
